item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "<i>Everything</i> that's important - you can take with you." -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "Why can't we resist the urge to second-guess and evaluate each other?...Sometimes I wonder if the final judgment will be a breeze compared with what we've put each other through here on earth. p 225" -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri Dew
item.description: "None of us come to this earth to gain our worth; we brought it with us." -- Sheri Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri Dew
item.description: "Noble and great. Courageous and determined. Faithful and fearless. That is who you are and who you have always been. And understanding it can change your life, because this knowledge carries a confidence that cannot be duplicated any other way." -- Sheri Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "In the things that really matter--our covenants, the commandments, and following the prophet--we need to be completely united. In the non-essentials, we have our agency to handle things as we see fit. But, in all things, regardless of whether we make the same choices or not, we are to treat each other with dignity and respect, both of which are evidences of charity in our hearts and lives." -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description:
"It is not possible to sin enough to be happy. It isn't possible to buy enough to be happy, or to entertain or indulge or pamper ourselves enough to be happy. It is not possible to hide enough or run far enough away from trials and troubles to be happy. Happiness and joy come only when we are living up to who we are...
I have never met anyone who was happier because he was immoral, or because he was addicted to something, or because he was dishonest and compromised his integrity. " -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "There <i>is</i> one thing the power of God and the power of Satan have in common: Neither can influence us unless we allow them to." -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "Am I the woman I think I am, the woman I want to be? More importantly, am I the woman the Savior needs me to be? " -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Sheri L. Dew
item.description: "We no longer have the luxury of spending our energy on anything that does not lead us and our families to Christ." -- Sheri L. Dew

item.title: Camille add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "Home is the nicest word there is." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Camille add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "The real things haven't changed. It is still best to be honest and truthful; to make the most of what we have; to be happy with simple pleasures; and have courage when things go wrong." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Camille add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "A good laugh overcomes more difficulties and dissipates more dark clouds than any other one thing." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Camille add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "There is nothing wrong with God's plan that man should earn his bread by the sweat of his brow." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen E. Robinson
item.description: "..he never requires more than I am able to give, and what he does require of me is always appropriate to my knowledge and circumstances....My obligation is to give all I have, not all someone else has, to be as good as I can be, not as good as someone else is." -- Stephen E. Robinson

item.title: Camille add a quote by Eric Weiner
item.description: "We help other people because we can, or because it makes us feel good, not because we're counting on some future payback. There is a word for this; love." -- Eric Weiner
